name: EMAC-82 Autocannon
description: The EMAC-82 32mm autocannon is an electromagnetic machine cannon that fires 32mm kinetic rounds. The relatively low damage of kinetic shells is compensated by the high rate of fire.

name: PLSL-100
description: The PLSL-100 is a plasma cannon that fires a single plasma round. This energy weapon is especially effective against armored targets.

name: EMAC-19-2 Reaper
description: The EMAC-19-2, nickname 'Reaper', is a twin-mounted electromagnetic autocannon. The EMAC-19-2 has been the primary cannon armament of Springfield Federation military fixed-wing aircrafts. It mounts on two separate turret bases on the wings of the aircraft.

name: PLSL-75C
description: The PLSL-75C is a burst-fire plasma cannon. It can fire up to three rounds at high rate of fire, but then requires a longer cooldown for recharging the turret.

name: SEMG-128 A3
description: The Super ElectroMagnetic Gun (SEMG) SEMG-128 is a spinal-mounted 128mm coilgun. It is originally designed for attacking gunships and light vessels. It has extremely high damage and high velocity. However, it also requires a long cooldown.
